choices.text:
As an AI language model, I can help explain how large language models (LLMs) are used in artificial intelligence (AI) research. In recent years, there has been a significant increase in the development and application of LLMs due to their ability to process natural language data efficiently. These models have become essential tools for AI researchers who require them to analyze vast amounts of textual information.

In AI research, LLMs are used to perform various tasks such as:
